comments.comment: I don't think that that money could be discovered or brought back because the banking system in those countries may divulge the account but will not allow anybody to proceed further. By the qay Ranil had deals and Ranil gave information to Rajapakshes is a rumor or a lie or a distortion of the truth. JVP should come up with proof and hard evidence or stop talking about it. The entire country knows that they stole the country dry but no one can recover the money that's the truth.

comments.comment: The money that these people have hidden cannot be recovered because their banking laws are designed to protect the investors and those who deposit money, unless you prove that that the money deposited is illegally acquired or robbed. So it is not an easy job, maybe we should follow their banking laws in order to attract foreign currency deposts in our banks that will lift the local currency's depreciation. By  the way only JVP are good guys who have not set fire to government building, buses, and public properties and government building and also they have never took weapons to fight the elected governments and killed people. JVP should repent and stop accusing others of wrong doings. According to JVP a country could only be govern by angels, not humans, perhaps they consider themselves as angels too.
comments.author: Truthprevails
